    level="1"
    right="Item 5+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wand of Continuation](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3051)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=731" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 282 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This wand increases a spell’s duration. Yellow embers spiral over its surface until the spell ends.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> Cast a Spell;  **Frequency** once per day, plus overcharge; the activation takes <actions string="Two Actions" /> if the spell normally takes <actions string="Single Action" /> to cast, or <actions string="Three Actions" /> if the spell normally takes <actions string="Two Actions" />;   **Effect** You Cast the Spell, and its duration is increased by half.

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of a spell of the appropriate rank. The spell must have a casting time of <actions string="Single Action" /> or <actions string="Two Actions" /> and a duration no less than 10 minutes and no greater than 1 hour.

</column>
